name: Office Manager (Skalbe, denorelli)
description:
A creepy first person puzzle survival game with a shadowy twist.

In a world, just like any other world, perhaps just a slightly more allegorical one, you are stuck in the office limbo, dealing with the demonically demanding shadows of your once compassionate coworkers.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Control:
WASD - Move
Spacebar - Jump
RMB - Echo ping
LMB - Shoot

When all enemies are dead look for the exit door
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Submission for Epic Meg Jam 2022.

Made by:

Juris Zebnickis - How the stuff works (https://twitter.com/zebnickis)

Denis Novikov - What the stuff looks like (https://twitter.com/denorelli2)
